name: GIMM Studio
description:
GIMM Studio is a space where students get to interact with their teachers in virtual classrooms. The future of this application hopes to allow students to upload custom content into the game through a website.

Currently, this project will be used to be a space for the 2021 Senior Showcase for GIMM students.

Desktop controls:

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Escape - Open menu

E - Interact

Left-click - Interact with UI

Enter - Open Chat

VR controls:

Left stick - Movement

A - Jump

X - Open menu

Trigger - Interact with UI and objects
